page.title: 10SKERRIES SALMON FARM
page.content:
The{salmon rafts}are made out of wood with metal at the corners for double strength. There are nets all round the cages so that the salmon cannot escape and no predators can get in.
There are{44000}salmon in{12 cages}and there are more on the way.
We feed the salmon with pellets. There are automatic feeders which work every 5 minutes. The men come about once or twice a day.
When the salmon grow big they are sold to a man in Vidlin and he sells them to places like{London, America}and {France.}
